ARABIC: وَمَن يَفْعَلْ ذَٰلِكَ عُدْوَٰنًا وَظُلْمًا فَسَوْفَ نُصْلِيهِ نَارًا وَكَانَ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: As for anyone who does that out of enmity and wrongdoing, We will roast him in a Fire. That is an easy
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: If someone does so through oppression or injustice, We shall cast him into Hell: This is how (the Law of) God works inevitably.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And whoever does this by way of transgression and injustice him shall We surely cast into the Fire; that indeed is quite easy for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Whoever commits murder out of animosity and injustice will be burnt in hell fire. This is a very easy thing for God to do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And whoever does that through injustice and oppression, We shall soon put him in the fire; and this is easy for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And whoever commits that through aggression and injustice, We shall cast him into the Fire, and that is easy for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And whoever does this aggressively and unjustly, We will soon cast him into fire; and this is easy to Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: But whosoever does that in transgression and wrongfully, him We shall certainly roast at a Fire; and that for God is an easy matter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Whoso doeth that through aggression and injustice, we shall cast him into Fire, and that is ever easy for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: If anyone does these things through transgression and injustice, We shall cast him into the Fire; and that is easy for God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And whosoever doth that in transgression- and wrong, presently We shall roast him in Fire; and with Allah that is ever easy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And whoever does that in aggression and injustice, We will soon make him enter the Fire, and that is easy for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: If any do that in rancour and injustice,- soon shall We cast them into the Fire: And easy it is for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And whoever commits that through aggression and injustice, We shall cast him into the Fire, and that is easy for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But whosoever does that in transgression and wrongfully We shall roast him in the Fire. That is an easy matter for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Whoever does that, out of hostility and wrongdoing, We will cast him into a Fire. And that would be easy for God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And whoever does that in aggression and injustice - then We will drive him into a Fire. And that, for Allah, is [always] easy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [4:30] And whoever does that, which he has been forbidden, through aggression (‘udwānan, a circumstantial qualifier), transgressing what is lawful, and injustice (zulman, [reiterated] for emphasis), him We shall certainly expose, admit, to a fire, wherein he shall burn; and that for God is an easy matter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Whoso doeth that) killing another or wrongfully taking another person's property (through aggression and injustice, We shall cast him into Fire) in the Hereafter; this is a threat to such a person, (and that) casting him into the Fire and tormenting him (is ever easy for Allah).
